name: Prototypes for Playdate
description:
Some are "playable" to a degree, but they are not full games:

  • Crank Ski (crank controls)
  • Kuranku (dodgy collision detection)
  • Mancala (random cpu skill)
  • Rotator (crank to aim and buttons to move)

Others are technical demos:

  • Band-kun (mockup of map screen & user interface)
  • Shadow (technical demo for shade of grey)
  • Sparrow Solitaire (shuffle and deal only)

Most future prototypes will end up in this collection.

Further information in my thread on the Playdate Dev Forum.

If you're a developer and want to continue one of these prototypes, get in touch! Leave a comment or DM me @gingerbeardman on twitter.
